special_text:
Transcend [i](Activate as a sorcery to gain the next type and a +1/+1 counter.)[/i]
Vigilance
Martoob of Flowing Life has ward {X}, where X is the number of counters on her.
{G}{U}: Angel
Put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
{2}{G}{U}: Elder
Double the number of counters on permanents you control.
